phrases: If we fall, who will protect Assiah?!
Is he a demon or what?!
You have got to be kidding me!
You are more demonic than I am.
You lost little lamb, confess your sins and say your prayers.
I did not do anything bad!
Then what is with those wounds?
I fell onto an insanely hot babe -
You had a fight again, right?!
Why do you always do that?!
They called from your part-time job earlier.
They said that they do not need someone who does not come back after completing a delivery.
You are saying that as if someone like me could do a decent job to begin with.
Do not act like a spoiled brat!
One day you will have to leave this abbey and make your own living!
It is my duty as your guardian to make you ready for that!
Or will you become a priest and lead the abbey?
Who would want this rotting old church?
I am finished with the preparations for moving.
Now I only have to actually move the stuff.
Did you have a fight again?
Even though they are twins, they are totally different!
The younger one, Yukio, is an athletic genius with amazing grades.
Also, this Spring he easily got into the True Cross Academy High School division.
While the older one only causes troubles.
Hey, Rin, if only you had just a fraction of your little brother's virtues.
I really need to buy a new heater...
Clean this up before the service!
Try to bear with it just a little longer.
Ah, so you are moving to a dorm?
After fifteen years, it is time to leave this abbey.
So is this the last time you will treat my wounds?
If I become a doctor, I will help you anytime.
If you pay the fees, that is.
Your dream is to become a doc, right?
I am sure you can do it!
Do not forget about the fees, brother.
But will you be all right without me around?
Are you going to scold me, too?
Father and the others from the abbey, too.
You have fights every day and you drop out from your jobs after a short while.
I am worried about it, too.
I know I should be growing up already.
There are too many of them.
They get in the way all the time.
What the hell are you doing?!
I am just shooting down these shitty birds!
It might be a test for you.
You are more and more like the old man.
They are looking for part-timers in the Southern Cross Mall.
We called them, and they were like come right away for the interview.
Why did you call them without asking me?!
Go on, I will lend you my suit.
Why should I wear a suit for a part-time job interview?
And here is a map and your CV.
How are you supposed to tie this thing?!
Really do not worry about it.
You have your parents watching over you.
If you have problems, ask your mommy and daddy first.
If they cannot help, then come asking us, the Exorcists.
It must be hard, to be an Exorcist.
You have to get rid of things that do not even exist.
Demons do exist, in our hearts.
They just asked to consult you.
By the way, what is with that get-up?
Everyone insisted on me going to the interview, so I borrowed it.
Heh, you just do not know how to tie it, do you?
Raise your collar and close the button.
Man, you are only growing up physically...
You were so cute when you were little, going daddy, daddy all the time.
I am grown-up now, you are embarrassing me!
I cannot see any grown-ups around!
If it is that embarrassing, show me how much you have grown!
Do not look down on me!
I will prove it to you that I can do it by myself!
Open your eyes wide and look!
That is not how the saying goes.
You want to start working right after finishing middle school?
I do not exactly like school...
You are very wrong if you think you can keep doing as you please in this world!
Line these up at the front of the store.
The boss is picking on the new guy again.
No way he could finish that in a day.
Boss, this is the last one!
I am not fit for work after all...
The boss bought a lot of it because it is cheap,
but it is not selling at all.
It is our new product, fried soba!
The secret of the flavor is this sauce!
And as a final touch, some dried fish for topping!
This way the taste will be as if done by a pro chef!
The staff meeting is at 8 every morning.
Do your best from tomorrow too!
Yeah, she was like do your best from tomorrow!
I am so happy I got some good news before leaving!
What are you all in tears about?
Today we are having Yukio's farewell party so we are making sukiyaki!
She was at our place earlier...
I will go take a look.
All the sukiyaki will be gone.
Come on, let us go home.
Even if I went home, how could I look everyone in the eye?
We do not need a berserk like that in the store.
Do not say stuff like that!
Everyone was happy that you finally got a job!
Explain it so that we will understand!
How could I explain something that I do not get myself?!
Thanks to you, just a few scratches.
She was always a careless child,
so she had lots of accidents, falling from stairs and stuff.
Gets her hair pulled and her stuff taken...
I have never seen anything like that before...
Small, with a face like a monkey...
I am going to call the school and get them punish the ones who bully Yui!
It is not humans who bully me!
In the night they come to my room and torture me!
Lately even outside of my room...
Yui's always had a lively imagination.
I have heard these tales many times,
but recently her imagination and reality gets mixed up too often...
If not even her parents believe her, who could she depend on?
It is a four-leaf clover charm.
She depends on you, her parents, the most.
You are a thousand years too early to scold others!
Also, Rin, you are forbidden to go out for a while!
The boss from that shop came by earlier with this.
It is a demand for the shop equipment and goods you destroyed!
You will not get any sukiyaki!
My stuff I sent yesterday will be arriving in the morning, so I have to leave early.
PS: Do not make Father worry any more.
Why does not anyone care about them?
You are forbidden to go out for a while!
Do you want to hide under your mommy's skirt?
We were just playing with the pigeons, but my hand acted on its own...
You know, my parents are kind of famous
and I will probably get into the True Cross Academy.
It would be a bother if rumors started spreading.
You are going to the same school as Yukio?
So we will just both keep silent, okay?
And I was wondering what you wanted.
I do not need your money.
And I will not say a word.
Now, sorry but I have got stuff to do.
Are you playing the cool guy?
You are so poor you could not even get into a proper school!
Your brother Yukio worked his ass off and got in the school with a scholarship, right?
He cannot even pay his fee -
You can badmouth me as much as you want,
but do not you dare say another word about my brother!
Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth, huh?
I will let you enjoy my pain a few times more!
Heh, those blue flames are the proof of Satan's offspring.
I was not mistaken after all.
Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavors,
give them after the work of their hands, render to them their desert.
Smite them and let them not rise again.
I shall seal that mouth of yours, so that you cannot spout your curses!
You can see them now too, right?
The Coal Tar that hangs on to dust,
and gathers around dark places and evil humans.
This world consists of two dimensions that face each other like mirrors.
One is our material world, Assiah.
The other is the nothingness of demons, Gehenna.
These two worlds are separate and they are not supposed to interact at all.
But they possess the material of this world and interact with it.
This incident has revealed them the truth about you.
There will be those who will come to hunt you down.
Wait a sec, I do not get it!
You are the child of a demon born of a human.
And not just any old demon, either.
The demon among demons, the evil god, Satan's child.
It was not by chance that I met you.
so that those eyes could keep on shining.
(With me) one day loses its way,
please open the door to the future.
So do not let go of that hand.
Hold on to these bonds we have.
Hold on to these bonds we have.
Do not ever say again that you are my father!
Finally I could meet you, my son.
It was not by chance that I met you.
so that those eyes could keep on shining.
(With me) one day loses its way,
please open the door to the future.
Hold on to these bonds we have.
So do not let go of that hand.
Hold on to these bonds we have.
Hold on to these bonds we have.
Episode one szia Demons Live In The Human Heart
